sentences: John Charles Crowley (born November 13, 1947, in Houston, Texas) is an American musician.
In his career, he has been a member of the band Player, has recorded one studio album "Beneath the Texas Moon" RCA Records 8370-2-R 1988 and charted several singles on the Billboard country charts.
In 1977, Crowley co-founded the rock band Player, and co-wrote their song "Baby Come Back".
Crowley survived a bout of cancer between 1994 and 1999.
